Postcode.description: The full postcode of the address e.g SW1A 1AA

PostcodeScheme.description: The scheme of the postcode e.g UK, US, AUS

PostcodeArea.description: The area part of the postcode of the address e.g SW

PostcodeDistrict.description: The district part of the postcode of the address e.g 1A

PostcodeSector.description: The sector part of the postcode of the address e.g 1

PostcodeUnit.description: The sector part of the postcode of the address e.g AA

IsVerified.description: Has the postcode been verified? e.g Y

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
